name: Counter-PsyOps and Diversion Strategies
description: Psychological warfare techniques designed to dismantle IDC propaganda and control mechanisms.

cards.title: Countering Propaganda and Indoctrination
cards.description: Strategies for reversing IDC brainwashing techniques on the masses.
bulletpoints: Identifying key psychological hooks in propaganda messaging.
Deploying counter-messaging strategies for ideological deprogramming.
Using satire and inversion tactics to disrupt psychological conditioning.
cards.summaryText: Spot propaganda hooks, launch counter-messages, and dismantle conditioning with strategic satire.

cards.title: Orchestrating Diversions to Disrupt Operations
cards.description: Techniques for misdirecting IDC forces and derailing planned operations.
bulletpoints: Using controlled leaks to manipulate enemy focus.
Creating ‘false flag’ distractions to pull attention away from critical movements.
Deploying fake crises to overload enemy resources.
cards.summaryText: Seed controlled leaks, stage diversions, and overload IDC resources through tactical crises.

cards.title: Psychological Reversal and PsyOps Sabotage
cards.description: Turning enemy psychological tactics against them for strategic advantage.
bulletpoints: Using mirroring techniques to destabilize enemy psychological attacks.
Deploying inversion strategies to redirect their narratives onto themselves.
Leveraging ‘perception warfare’ to cause disarray within their ranks.
cards.summaryText: Mirror their psyops, invert their narratives, and weaponize perception warfare to sow disarray.
